thread.section_title: Mercure London Paddington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service above and beyond
thread.title_full: Service above and beyond - Review of Mercure London Paddington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David S
title: Service above and beyond
text:
conveniently located. Excellent staff & service
Because of eventual 42hr flight delay ( nothing to do with hotel ). we finally needed extra two nights - one at this hotel and one at Heathrow . Reception staff member ROMINA was quite outstanding in solving our problems and handling our needs not only at this hotel but also at Heathrow , where she got us a good room at a good price and arranged a speedy check-in . Her efforts on our behalf were quite outstanding and we cannot praise her enough !
